pages.text: The essence of magick is to use props to guide the mana in one's body, and the mana of different elements will also show different characteristics. The key to channeling one's own mana is the spirit crystal. Getting some spirit crystals is also the beginning of our manipulating magic.
Spirit crystals drop from spirit ores

Spirit crystals can be placed in a special way to guide small magic circles, which we can call magic synthesis matrix, and magic synthesis matrix are the beginning of our follow-up operations. Maybe you should dig some Spirit crystals first, and then proceed to the next step.
